channel.title: Devolution V1.6
channel.description:
Since these flaming comments are on... FFS Please only comment if it's good, these kids get annoying. Credits- 2% to me adding Npcs, And teleports, and more... 98% to Bukatool
Here it is http://www.mediafire.com/?m2hykyyky0i
Since I have been coding a server, Fairscape, many people have played and injoyed my updates. But, the pressure got harder and harder for me as everyone wanted me to add something, or fix a bug. I just want to say I am releasing this source so I can start over and figure more stuff out. If you looked at Devolution Revolution V1, It was realy week coding. That is because I wasn't as good and didn't know how to work with the (client) files. One thing I want to explain is Updates.
I may add pictures later but for now here is a list of the server updates.
----Updates---- New Npc's at home, Instead of Melee Npcs that drop Melee, there are now Mage Npc's that drop Melee. New ::help, witch tells you what you can train on for exp. New teleports including, New Christmas Teleport, Champions Guild Telport, New Npc's Added in all Teleports Btw. Legends Guild Teleport, And all Teleports have been changed but Home. Type ::switch, Trollheim teleport, and theres new Npc's there to. There are new talking npc's such as the Runescape guide at home, he tells you what you need to do. Santa at Christmas teleport, and that is about it.
Well its not much, but I think the hoster will get few more players saying a lot is different compared to the regular source's.
What you should use for server... (SILABGARZA CLIENT, OR ANY DELTA CLIENT SO YOU CAN SEE GODSWORDS AND OTHER STUFF!)
Thanks for viewing, some people might not be impressed, but I hope someone likes it.

Since these flaming comments are on… FFS Please only comment if it’s good, these kids get annoying.
Credits- 2% to me adding Npcs, And teleports, and more…
98% to Bukatool

Here it is
http://www.mediafire.com/?m2hykyyky0i

      Since I have been coding a server, Fairscape, many people have played and injoyed my updates.  But, the pressure got harder and harder for me as everyone wanted me to add something, or fix a bug.  I just want to say I am releasing this source so I can start over and figure more stuff out.  If you looked at Devolution Revolution V1, It was realy week coding. That is because I wasn't as good and didn't know how to work with the (client) files.  One thing I want to explain is Updates.

I may add pictures later but for now here is a list of the server updates.

----Updates----
New Npc’s at home, Instead of Melee Npcs that drop Melee, there are now Mage Npc’s that drop Melee. New ::help, witch tells you what you can train on for exp. New teleports including, New Christmas Teleport, Champions Guild Telport, New Npc’s Added in all Teleports Btw. Legends Guild Teleport, And all Teleports have been changed but Home. Type ::switch, Trollheim teleport, and theres new Npc’s there to. There are new talking npc’s such as the Runescape guide at home, he tells you what you need to do. Santa at Christmas teleport, and that is about it.

Well its not much, but I think the hoster will get few more players saying a lot is different compared to the regular source’s.

What you should use for server…
(SILABGARZA CLIENT, OR ANY DELTA CLIENT SO YOU CAN SEE GODSWORDS AND OTHER STUFF!)

Thanks for viewing, some people might not be impressed, but I hope someone likes it.
